price: And listen! On the Day when the Caller will call out from a nearby place[20],
arabic: وَٱسۡتَمِعۡ يَوۡمَ يُنَادِ ٱلۡمُنَادِ مِن مَّكَانٖ قَرِيبٖ
footnotes: [20] The angel who will blow the second trumpet for the Resurrection.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
